name: Wind Child
description: Five souls, brought together in a simple rescue mission, come to learn that they are more connected than they had believed. Classic RPG goodness and intriguing storyline with this RPG from Valkyria Studios.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
